entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Freezing rain or periods of rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Ice pellets early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
